channel.description: Recent content in Streamlit on Home

item.title: Interactive Dashboards to Understand Data Scientist Job Locations and Job Types in 2024
item.description: Project Structure Task 1: Obtained the dataset from Kaggle, ensuring we had the necessary data to analyze. Task 2: Transformed simple Python scripts into web applications, making the analysis accessible through a user-friendly interface. Task 3: Loaded the dataset containing job data for data scientists in 2024, preparing it for visualization. Task 4: Implemented functionality to display job types in the sidebar, enhancing user navigation and interaction. Task 5: Developed interactive bar plots and pie charts to visually represent key insights from the data.
